akn:content.akn:p:
§ 8510. Finality of decisions Decisions by the Secretary under this subchapter shall not be reviewable administratively by any other officer of the United States. (Pub. L. 85–857, Sept. 2, 1958, 72 Stat. 1259, § 5210; renumbered § 8510, Pub. L. 102–40, title IV, § 402(b)(1), May 7, 1991, 105 Stat. 238; Pub. L. 102–83, § 4(b)(1), (2)(E), Aug. 6, 1991, 105 Stat. 404, 405.)
Editorial Notes Amendments1991—Pub. L. 102–40 renumbered section 5210 of this title as this section. Pub. L. 102–83 substituted “Secretary” for “Administrator”.
